QuestData.Title: The Totem of Kar'dash
QuestData.Description: Thank you, stranger. They would have surely killed me had it not been for you.$B$BI was kidnapped by these Murkbloods 3 nights ago during a nighttime raid on Garadar. What I have since uncovered may very well shake the foundation of the Outland: these savages seek to recover the totem of Kar'dash! We cannot allow the totem to fall into the hands of the Murkbloods!$B$BYou must help me escape. And stranger, if I do not make it back to Garadar, you must tell Garrosh what happened here...
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort the Mag'har Captive out of Sunspring Post. Speak to Garrosh at Garadar if you succeed.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Garrosh at Garadar in Nagrand.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Garrosh barely acknowledges your presence. He appears deeply depressed.>
QuestData.RewardText: What does it matter? The Greatmother is dying. Life is not worth living...
